coded_answer.p: I am very glad to write to you. I spent two days at the International Arts festival you organised. I enjoyed most of the events I went to, but I feel that the festival could be even better next year. Here are some opinions and suggestions:

Although your advertisement said there would be stars and artists from around the world, I was able to see artists from only six countries. Additionally, some concert halls were too small to relax in, whilethough most of them were very comfortable.
It was a pity for me that there were fewer plays and films than I had expected. I suggest to you that you should organise more next year.

On the other hand, there werewas a lot that impressed me very much. For example, there was one reasonably-pricedreasonably priced weekend ticket for all events. It is a very good way to increase the number of music-lovers.
Last but not lastLast but not least, I would like to thank you for devoting yourself to making this festival wonderful every year. I enjoyed it very much.

The boy had grown and had become very strong when he heard that there were lots of devils on Onigashima Island who robbed many people in Bizen of mucha lot of money and manya lot of treasurestreasure. Having eaten the kibidango, he departed for Onigashima with three friends of himhis: a dog, a monkey and a bird.
